That which<S>3739</S> was<S>2258</S> from<S>575</S> the beginning<S>746</S>, which<S>3739</S> we have heard<S>191</S>, which<S>3739</S> we have seen<S>3708</S> with our<S>2257</S> eyes<S>3788</S>, which<S>3739</S> we have looked upon<S>2300</S>, and<S>2532</S> our<S>2257</S> hands<S>5495</S> have handled<S>5584</S>, of<S>4012</S> the Word<S>3056</S> of life<S>2222</S>;
(For<S>2532</S> the life<S>2222</S> was manifested<S>5319</S>, and<S>2532</S> we have seen<S>3708</S> it, and<S>2532</S> bear witness<S>3140</S>, and<S>2532</S> shew<S>518</S> unto you<S>5213</S> that eternal<S>166</S> life<S>2222</S>, which<S>3748</S> was<S>2258</S> with<S>4314</S> the Father<S>3962</S>, and<S>2532</S> was manifested<S>5319</S> unto us<S>2254</S>;)
That which<S>3739</S> we have seen<S>3708</S> and<S>2532</S> heard<S>191</S> declare we<S>518</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, that<S>2443</S> ye<S>5210</S> also<S>2532</S> may have<S>2192</S> fellowship<S>2842</S> with<S>3326</S> us<S>2257</S>: and<S>2532</S> truly our<S>2251</S> fellowship<S>2842</S> <S>1161</S> is with<S>3326</S> the Father<S>3962</S>, and<S>2532</S> with<S>3326</S> his<S>846</S> Son<S>5207</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>.
And<S>2532</S> these things<S>5023</S> write we<S>1125</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, that<S>2443</S> your<S>5216</S> joy<S>5479</S> may be<S>5600</S> full<S>4137</S>.
This<S>3778</S> then<S>2532</S> is<S>2076</S> the message<S>1860</S> which<S>3739</S> we have heard<S>191</S> of<S>575</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> declare<S>312</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, that<S>3754</S> God<S>2316</S> is<S>2076</S> light<S>5457</S>, and<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S> is<S>2076</S> no<S>3756</S> darkness<S>4653</S> at all<S>3762</S>.
If<S>1437</S> we say<S>2036</S> that<S>3754</S> we have<S>2192</S> fellowship<S>2842</S> with<S>3326</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> walk<S>4043</S> in<S>1722</S> darkness<S>4655</S>, we lie<S>5574</S>, and<S>2532</S> do<S>4160</S> not<S>3756</S> the truth<S>225</S>:
But<S>1161</S> if<S>1437</S> we walk<S>4043</S> in<S>1722</S> the light<S>5457</S>, as<S>5613</S> he<S>846</S> is<S>2076</S> in<S>1722</S> the light<S>5457</S>, we have<S>2192</S> fellowship<S>2842</S> one with another<S>3326</S> <S>240</S>, and<S>2532</S> the blood<S>129</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> his<S>846</S> Son<S>5207</S> cleanseth<S>2511</S> us<S>2248</S> from<S>575</S> all<S>3956</S> sin<S>266</S>.
If<S>1437</S> we say<S>2036</S> that<S>3754</S> we have<S>2192</S> no<S>3756</S> sin<S>266</S>, we deceive<S>4105</S> ourselves<S>1438</S>, and<S>2532</S> the truth<S>225</S> is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> in<S>1722</S> us<S>2254</S>.
If<S>1437</S> we confess<S>3670</S> our<S>2257</S> sins<S>266</S>, he is<S>2076</S> faithful<S>4103</S> and<S>2532</S> just<S>1342</S> to<S>2443</S> forgive<S>863</S> us<S>2254</S> our sins<S>266</S>, and<S>2532</S> to cleanse<S>2511</S> us<S>2248</S> from<S>575</S> all<S>3956</S> unrighteousness<S>93</S>.
If<S>1437</S> we say<S>2036</S> that<S>3754</S> we have<S>264</S> not<S>3756</S> sinned<S>264</S>, we make<S>4160</S> him<S>846</S> a liar<S>5583</S>, and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> word<S>3056</S> is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> in<S>1722</S> us<S>2254</S>.
